revision.text:
__NOTOC__ fixed '''GetPolyobjY''' (int ''po'')
== Usage ==
This returns the Y coordinate of the polyobject.
=== Parameters ===
* ''po'': Number of the polyobject.
=== Return value ===
The Y coordinate of the polyobject's start point, as a [[Definitions|fixed point]] value world coordinate. A value of 0x7FFFFFFF (32767 when converted from integer to fixed point) means that the polyobject in question does not exist.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
== See also == * [[PolyObjects]] * [[GetPolyobjX]]
[[category:ACS Information functions]]
